name: Achelous Falls
long_desc:
As the Boy approaches the edge of the forest, the sound of water gets louder and louder. Emerging from the trees, he comes face to face with not just a river, but the tail of a rapidly flowing stream leaping off of a nearby cliff to form a <waterfall>.  He stares in amazement at how the seemingly endless water rushes off the edge. As his eyes follow upstream, he witnesses several batches of large multi-colored fish hopping in and out of the water, like excited kids on a fast ride.

Turning more upstream and to the east, the Boy notices an archway in front of numerous buildings - a <town entrance>. Near the area’s entrance, he can see humans moving about. “People!”, he exclaims.  Knowing a familiar species exists around here, let alone fellow humans, helps him feel a sense of normalcy and relax a bit. A sign near the flowing water reads: “Achelous Falls”.
short_desc: The <waterfall> is as bustling as it always is, rushing to the edge and flowing downwards into a basin.  To the south is the forest, where he awoke earlier.

features.name: waterfall
features.desc: The Boy isn’t all too fond of heights, so he avoids getting too close to look over the edge, but he can tell it’s a massive fall. The water flows powerfully and loudly, as if trying to make its presence known.

features.name: town entrance
features.desc: Looking towards the town, the Boy sees its citizens scurrying about, giving it an air of liveliness.  The area at the entryway looks residential.
